<title level="1" pfs="">[Old Crackjaw](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2233)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 30

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Old Crackjaw](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2233)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 77</row>

**Perception** +11; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +2

**Con** +4

**Int** -4

**Wis** +4

**Cha** -2
</row>

**Deep Breath** Old Crackjaw can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 23 

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +13 

</row>

**HP** 78

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 15 feet, swim 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="" />
jaws +14,
**Damage** 2d8+7 piercing

**Clench Jaws** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** Old Crackjaw damaged a creature with a jaws Strike with its previous action; **Effect** Old Crackjaw clenches its jaw and automatically deals an additional 2d8 bludgeoning damage to the creature it just hit.

**Gnawing Bite** <actions string="Two Actions" />  Old Crackjaw makes a jaws Strike against an object. This counts as two attacks when calculating Old Crackjaw's multiple attack penalty. If this Strike hits, Old Crackjaw deals an extra die of weapon damage to the object.

**Shell Defense** <actions string="Single Action" />  Old Crackjaw retracts its limbs and head into its shell and ends its turn. This increases its AC to 25, but it can't act except to reemerge, which it can do as a single action.

</column>
name: Old Crackjaw

text: Old Crackjaw Recall Knowledge - Animal (Nature): DC 30 Unspecific Lore : DC 28 Specific Lore : DC 25 Old Crackjaw Source Kingmaker Adventure Path pg. 77 Perception +11; low-light vision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet Languages Skills Athletics +12, Stealth +11 Str +5 Dex +2 Con +4 Int -4 Wis +4 Cha -2 Deep Breath Old Crackjaw can hold its breath for 30 minutes. --- AC 23 Fort +15 Ref +9 Will +13 HP 78 --- Speed 15 feet, swim 25 feet Melee jaws +14, Damage 2d8+7 piercing Clench Jaws Single Action Requirements Old Crackjaw damaged a creature with a jaws Strike with its previous action; Effect Old Crackjaw clenches its jaw and automatically deals an additional 2d8 bludgeoning damage to the creature it just hit. Gnawing Bite Two Actions Old Crackjaw makes a jaws Strike against an object. This counts as two attacks when calculating Old Crackjaw's multiple attack penalty. If this Strike hits, Old Crackjaw deals an extra die of weapon damage to the object. Shell Defense Single Action Old Crackjaw retracts its limbs and head into its shell and ends its turn. This increases its AC to 25, but it can't act except to reemerge, which it can do as a single action.
